医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型纳米薄超级细菌杀死材料可以彻底改变伤口愈合研究人员发明了一种纳米薄的超级细菌杀死材料，有一天可以将其整合到伤口敷料和植入物中，以预防或治愈细菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/New-nano-thin-superbug-slaying-material-could-revolutionize-wound-healing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/New-nano-thin-superbug-slaying-material-could-revolutionize-wound-healing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac42927a-fd16-4f79-ae15-1323a1dcb2f2 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 13:57:51 -0400 New nano-thin superbug-slaying material could revolutionize wound healing
UT Health San Antonio 和 UTSA 推出美国首个医学和人工智能 MD/MS 项目德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心 (UT Health San Antonio) 的 Joe R. 和 Teresa Lozano Long 医学院和德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥分校大学学院 (UTSA) 正式启动第一个已知项目在美国，将医学和人工智能结合起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/UT-Health-San-Antonio-and-UTSA-launch-first-US-MDMS-program-in-medicine-and-artificial-intelligence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/UT-Health-San-Antonio-and-UTSA-launch-first-US-MDMS-program-in-medicine-and-artificial-intelligence.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=911aefe7-6e02-421e-8a51-3d91da39c2fa Thu, 14 Sep 2023 13:49:59 -0400 UT Health San Antonio and UTSA launch first U.S. MD/MS program in medicine and artificial intelligence
同伴主导的导航计划可改善种族和民族少数退伍军人的心理健康结果由美国退伍军人事务部 (VA) 和 Regenstrief 研究所的 Johanne Eliacin 博士领导的研究科学家开发了 PARTNER-MH，这是一项创新的、同行主导的患者导航计划，旨在支持寻求心理保健的种族和族裔少数退伍军人，无论所需的心理健康服务类型或心理健康诊断如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Peer-led-navigation-program-improves-mental-health-outcomes-for-racially-and-ethnically-minoritized-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Peer-led-navigation-program-improves-mental-health-outcomes-for-racially-and-ethnically-minoritized-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbf24889-ea61-4fbc-9fa4-165b390fcfa5 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 13:36:54 -0400 Peer-led navigation program improves mental health outcomes for racially and ethnically minoritized veterans
Eris 亚系 EG.5.1 比其他 SARS-CoV-2 谱系能更好地逃避中和抗体接种疫苗或感染后，我们的免疫系统会产生抗体，附着在 SARS-CoV-2 的刺突蛋白上，防止病毒进入细胞并在细胞内复制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Eris-sublineage-EG51-can-escape-neutralizing-antibodies-better-than-other-SARS-CoV-2-lineages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Eris-sublineage-EG51-can-escape-neutralizing-antibodies-better-than-other-SARS-CoV-2-lineages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2320cc08-e8f2-4e67-bf4f-d2e4e209d13b Thu, 14 Sep 2023 13:21:21 -0400 Eris sublineage EG.5.1 can escape neutralizing antibodies better than other SARS-CoV-2 lineages
新试验显示联合新辅助免疫疗法治疗肺癌的前景1-3 期非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者在手术前接受联合免疫治疗（新辅助治疗），在癌症切除后比接受单一免疫治疗的患者有更好的主要病理缓解（残留癌症 10% 或更少）根据一项新型多中心 2 期 NeoCOAST 平台试验的结果，该试验包括来自约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心及其彭博-金梅尔癌症免疫治疗研究所的两名研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/New-trial-shows-promise-of-combination-neoadjuvant-immunotherapy-for-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/New-Trial-shows-promise-of-combination-neoadjuvant-immunotherapy-for-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=969e3286-6552-4c1c-8fb9-3b4c33c16103 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 12:40:27 -0400 New trial shows promise of combination neoadjuvant immunotherapy for lung cancer
乳腺癌死亡率的地理差异：居住地点的影响最近发表在《JAMA Network Open》上的一篇新论文探讨了美国各县的死亡率差异，这些县的地理位置与多种社会人口因素相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Geographic-disparities-in-breast-cancer-mortality-how-where-you-live-could-matter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Geographic-disparities-in-breast-cancer-mortality-how-where-you-live-could-matter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96671762-334c-4773-a083-5d67d15a8375 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 12:14:00 -0400 Geographic disparities in breast cancer mortality: how where you live could matter
多组学研究为牛皮癣治疗提供了见解研究人员采用多组学方法，结合免疫细胞富集的 scRNA-seq、微阵列分析和免疫组织化学，阐明抗 IL-17A 在抑制 T17 细胞自身免疫功能中的转化作用，从而有效治疗人类牛皮癣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Multi-omics-study-offers-insights-into-psoriasis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Multi-omics-study-offers-insights-into-psoriasis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a477126f-8d74-4934-8281-b698a9a13dd9 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 11:51:00 -0400 Multi-omics study offers insights into psoriasis treatment
恢复病毒宿主：新发现改变了对艾滋病毒治疗的理解研究人员深入了解了 T 淋巴细胞与持续存在的 HIV 病毒库之间的相互作用，以及对利用有效、持久的应对措施来根除 HIV 的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Reviving-reservoirs-new-findings-shake-up-HIV-treatment-understanding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Reviving-reservoirs-new-findings-shake-up-HIV-treatment-understanding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a00c1f1-16a0-4912-bfce-b41c96246a0a Thu, 14 Sep 2023 11:29:00 -0400 Reviving reservoirs: new findings shake up HIV treatment understanding
MRI 创新揭示人脑铁稳态研究人员展示了一种对活体大脑的铁稳态（放松或松弛度的 r1-r2 程度）敏感的 MRI 方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/MRI-innovation-to-unveil-iron-homeostasis-in-the- human-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/MRI-innovation-to-unveil-iron-homeostasis-in-the- human-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfbd13c1-c631-4298-80c4-edeacab569c7 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 10:50:00 -0400 MRI innovation to unveil iron homeostasis in the human brain
研究表明输血与脑出血之间存在联系，但需要进一步研究研究人员调查了献血者献血后自发性脑出血是否与输血受者自发性脑出血的发生有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Study-suggests-link- Between-blood-transfusions-and-brain-hemorrhages-but-further-research-needed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Study-suggests-link- Between-blood-transfusions-and-brain-hemorrhages-but-further-research-needed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ec2b937-963f-4789-a14b-22dfb14f5cd0 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 10:22:00 -0400 Study suggests link between blood transfusions and brain hemorrhages, but further research needed
